item.title: Review: Bitcoin 'Vault' Trezor Lives Up to its Name
item.description:
Review: Bitcoin 'Vault' Trezor Lives Up to its Name

Although most bitcoin users rely on freely-available web and mobile wallets, recent security scares clearly illustrate the need for safer alternatives. Here, we take a closer look at one device designed to address the problem.

item.title: AirBitz - Mobile Bitcoin Wallet | Bit Reviews | Software, Casino, Bitcoins Review
item.description:
AirBitz - Mobile Bitcoin Wallet | Bit Reviews | Software, Casino, Bitcoins Review

AirBitz Mobile Bitcoin Wallet was showcased at a Bitcoin Meetup that I attended several months ago, and I had the opportunity to talk to Paul (the CEO) and ask him some questions, as well as hear his answers to other's questions. Airbitz has made a great little iPhone and Android mobile wallet.

item.title: Choose your wallet - Bitcoin
item.description:
Choose your wallet - Bitcoin

This wallet is a full node that validates and relays transactions on the Bitcoin network. This means no trust in a third party is required when verifying payments. Full nodes provide the highest level of security and are essential to protecting the network. However, they require more space (over 20GB), bandwidth, and a longer initial synchronization time.

item.title: Bitcoin: New Generation Of 'Hard' Wallets Bodes Well For Long Term Value
item.description:
Bitcoin: New Generation Of 'Hard' Wallets Bodes Well For Long Term Value

It doesn't take a genius to see that the future of Bitcoin as a currency depends on its value, or rather people's perception of its value. In this context, value does not necessarily equate to price.

item.title: Airbitz
item.description:
Airbitz

URL: Airbitz.co ‚óè About: Airbitz is a mobile bitcoin wallet that is made for Apple iOS devices and Google Android devices. Airbitz features automatic wallet encryption and cloud backup, and device-to-device account sync across phone, tablet, iOS, and Android. Mobile wallet users can store, send, and receive bitcoin transactions.

item.title: Fall 2015: Top Rated Bitcoin Wallets
item.description:
Fall 2015: Top Rated Bitcoin Wallets

Welcome to our Fall 2015 edition of the top rated and reviewed bitcoin wallets, where we highlight the best ranked bitcoin wallets on the market according to community reviews. For those unfamiliar with our website, we have the largest database of bitcoin wallets where we monitor every wallet and provide tools to the bitcoin community to rate and review each one.
